name: Death's Toll (itch)
description:
Entry for the nokia 3310 jam 2

A story platform about the friendship between a dog and death. 

Controls:

W/A/S/D/Arrow Keys - Movement
Q - Summon soul/Create platform (Requires a soul)
E - Interact

Created by

MaggiMcHetz - Artist/Design
Magic_Spark - Audio/Design
Stealthix - Programming/Design
